questions.title: 我真受不了你把房间弄这么脏。
questions.answer: I've had it up to here with the dirty room you made.

questions.title: 我真受不了那个吵闹的婴儿。
questions.answer: I've had it up to here with that noisy baby.

questions.title: 南方人受不了北方户外寒冷的冬天。
questions.answer: People who come from the south have had it up to here with a cold winteroutside in the north.

questions.title: 我们学校所有的学生都受不了校长严厉的管教。
questions.answer: All students in our school have had it up to here with the president'sharsh discipline.

questions.title: 我真受不了他的长头发。
questions.answer: I've had it up here with his long hair.

questions.title: 我真受够了，你什么时候能不抱怨啊？
questions.answer: I've had it up to here with you.When would you stop complaining?

title: ——我受不了我妈妈的唠叨。
——如果她不爱你，她不会变成这样。

answer.en: I've had it up to here with my nagging mother.
She would not become this person if she doesn't love you.

title: ——我真的受不了汤姆说谎的习惯。
——他不觉得自己有罪。

answer.en: I've had it up to here with Tom's habit of telling a lie.
He feels no consciousness of guilt.

title: ——我的室友真让我受够了，寝室里的活她什么都不管。
——你应该和她好好谈谈，告诉她你的想法。

answer.en: I've had it up to here with my roommate. She never lifts a finger aroundthe dorm.
You shall talk with her thoroughly, and tell her what you think.
